item.title: Welcome on board
item.description: Today the Putnami Web Toolkit is out! First public announcement has been done on the GWT google group. We really hope that we're gonna enjoy :)
item.author: Fabien

item.title: Release 1.0.0-RC2 planned.
item.description: We're close to get all expected features planned for the 1.0.0 . we decided to fix the RC2 to the Friday 4th of july.
item.author: Fabien
